credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Stage Design: Temple of Ingratitude
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Horizontal rectangle: circular subterranean vaulted hall, huge supporting column in the middle in the centre of which a kind of altar with temple statue lying on it.
name: Drawing
